__TOC__

'''Target Sign-off''': this is an image we want to build for the milestone release,  all the bug fixes may not have landed, but daily builds and testing should be done on it from the submitted fixes, until we're ready for final QA.  Right publishing locations, architectures, seeds should be checked. <<BR>>
'''Testing Sign-off''': this indicates the images has all the fixes we intend for the point release, and has been tested, checked to be at the expected quality level, and ready to ship as part of the milestone release.
